contents.text: Welcome to Joy, the free San Francisco–based wedding website and app that does more.
Press '1' for customer support, including technical assistance and account help.
Press '1' for technical support and troubleshooting.
Thank you for choosing technical support. Please hold while we connect you to a Joy technical specialist.

navigationGoals: I’m unable to upload photos in the Joy app and need a quick troubleshooting fix.
I need technical help accessing my wedding site on my phone.
Troubleshoot my CSV import error in the dev console when uploading a guest list to my Joy site.
I’m having trouble uploading photos to my wedding website and need help fixing it.
Help me troubleshoot why my guest list CSV won’t import into the RSVP feature.

contents.text: Press '2' for account and billing inquiries.
Thank you for contacting account services. Please hold while we connect you with our billing and account representative.

navigationGoals: I need to update my payment method and confirm my latest billing charges.
I want to apply my veteran discount and update my billing info.
Change my subscription to the annual premium plan and get the detailed invoice breakdown.
I need to update the credit card on file and check my billing statement.
Clarify the billing details and charges for my custom domain upgrade.

contents.text: Press '2' for information about our wedding planning features and premium upgrades.
Press '1' for a guided demo of our premium wedding planning tools.
Thank you for your interest in our premium offerings. Please hold while we connect you to a Joy wedding specialist.

navigationGoals: I’d like a concise walkthrough of the premium wedding planning tools.
I’d like a guided demo of the premium planning tools for seating and guest management.
Get a guided walkthrough of the premium seating-chart editor and automated RSVP workflow features.
I’d like a step-by-step demo of the premium guest list and seating chart features.
Walk me through the premium seating chart and guest management tools.

contents.text: Press '2' for partnership and vendor inquiries.
Thank you for your partnership inquiry. Please hold while we connect you with our vendor relations team.

navigationGoals: I’m a wedding florist interested in discussing a vendor partnership with Joy.
I’m a veteran caterer interested in listing my services as a vendor on Joy.
Discuss API integration and affiliate partnership options for my wedding photography business.
I want information on how to partner as a vendor with your service.
Let me apply as a catering vendor partner on the Joy platform.
